typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  * FROM [dbo].[Calendar]\nWHERE  CalendarDate = convert(date, getdate(), 1) ',
	format: 'query') ~> Calendar
source(output(
		date as timestamp,
		{sentiment score} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	query: 'SELECT RSSparsedBCHnews.date,\nRSSparsedBCHnews["sentiment score"] \n\n FROM RSSparsedBCHnews\nWHERE RSSparsedBCHnews.date  != null',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> RSSparseSource
source(output(
		Date as timestamp,
		{body sentiment score} as double,
		{title sentiment score} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	query: 'SELECT APIparsedBCHnews.Date,\nAPIparsedBCHnews["title sentiment score"],\nAPIparsedBCHnews["body sentiment score"]\n\n FROM APIparsedBCHnews',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> RedditparseSource
source(output(
		Date_price as date,
		Last_trade_price as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PriceHist
RSSparseSource derive(date = toDate(date)) ~> RSSscore
RSSscore, Calendar join(CalendarDate == date,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, RedditScores join(CalendarDate == RedditScores@Date,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
RedditparseSource derive(Date = toDate(Date)) ~> RedditScores
Join2, PriceHist join(CalendarDate == Date_price,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 aggregate(groupBy(CalendarDate),
	{sentiment score} = mean({sentiment score}),
		{body sentiment score} = mean({body sentiment score}),
		{title sentiment score} = mean({title sentiment score}),
		Last_trade_price = mean(Last_trade_price),
		{total sentiment} = (mean(iifNull({sentiment score},0))+mean(iifNull({body sentiment score},0))+mean(iifNull({title sentiment score},0))) / (countIf(iifNull({sentiment score},0)!=0,1) + countIf(iifNull({body sentiment score},0)!=0,1) + countIf(iifNull({title sentiment score},0)!=0,1))) ~> FinalDataAggregate
FinalDataAggregate sink(input(
		TradeDate as date,
		BCHprice as double,
		FinalSentiment as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		TradeDate = CalendarDate,
		BCHprice = Last_trade_price,
		FinalSentiment = {total sentiment}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FinalFeed
